biotools.summary: SC-GAN is a tool for 3D self-attention conditional GAN with spectral normalization for multi-modal neuroimaging synthesis. SC-GAN was assessed for positron emission tomography (PET), Fractional anisotropy (FA) and mean diffusivity (MD) synthesis from tasks using T1w and FLAIR magnetic resonance images (MRI).
